page.title: 19Tears Farm\Lawrenson's Farm
page.content: Tears Farm=65 acres. They grow lettuce celery, leeks,white cabbage & carrots. {They always grow "Iceberg" lettuces as a main crop.}The growing season is April to September - cut fields are replanted immediately. Growing season= 8 weeks for lettuce to grow from the seed plants which are bought from David Abrams in Banks, Nr.Southport.{Animals are not kept}because the ground is too light & sandy. The farm employs 30 casual labourers from 8am to 5pm. at piece work rates of pay. The lettuces are packed in dozens by 3 packers. They pack 2500 to 3000 dozen a day. Markets= London, Gateshead & Cardiff. (Owners= Polding.\G.R.=0347704098) {Lawrenson's Farm} Owners=Clayton,David & Peter,1 extra worker. They grow veg.,fruit & barley on the 100 acres of the farm. Mainly strawberries=cambridge favourite Main potatoes are K.Edward & Pentland.
